Dechreuad a rhyfedhus esmudiad yr Eglvvys yr Arglvvydhes Fair o Loreto. Translatio miraculosa Ecclesiae Beatae Mariae Virginis de Loreto. Welsh Teramano, Pietro. Corbington, Robert, 1596-1637.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill.
Per Francesco Serafini., In Loreto : M. DC.XXXV. [1635].
Attributed to Pietro Teramano; transl. from Latin by R. Corbington--Cf. STC (2nd ed.). "Con licenza de' Superiori." Reproduction of original in: British Library.
=======

1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill.
Per Francesco Serafini., In Loreto : M. DC.XXXV. [1635].
Attributed to Pietro Teramano; transl. from Latin by R. Corbington--Cf. STC (2nd ed.). "Con licenza de' Superiori." Reproduction of original in: British Library.
